'''Mint''' is a [[Cooking Ingredient]] commonly found in the wild all over [[Teyvat]].

==How to Obtain==
Mint grows on grassy terrains throughout Teyvat, and is commonly found in all regions.

See the Video Guides section or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=161 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes. Mint is readily available throughout the land and is know for its exuberant vitality.}}

==Trivia==
* While the stems of mint plants are mostly green throughout Teyvat, the stems are yellow in Dragonspine.
* [[Ararycan]] remarks that mint is so strong that it can withstand [[The Withering]].
* {{Related Items|type=variant}}
